Structs/State/Pending.html#/s:vVV8XCESta.name: partialState
Structs/State/Pending.html#/s:vVV8XCESta.abstract: The key part of the pending state, that holds its identifier vlaue and onSet closure, but needs to be completed with onUpdate closure.

Structs/State.html#/s:V8XCEState5State6G.name: Getter
Structs/State.html#/s:V8XCEState5State6G.abstract: Closure that serves as a wrapper inside which you can access any of the declared states for given object when applying a state via Dispatcher.

Structs/State.html#/s:V8XCEState5State14.name: TargetMutation
Structs/State.html#/s:V8XCEState5State14.abstract: Closure that declares mutations to be made on Target object.

Structs/State.html#/s:vV8XCEState5State1.name: identifier
Structs/State.html#/s:vV8XCEState5State1.abstract: Unique identifier that helps to distinct one state from another.

Structs/State/Pending.html.name: Pending
Structs/State/Pending.html.abstract: Helper structure that works as mediator in the state declaration when we need to declare state with both onSet and onUpdate closures.

Structs/State.html#/s:FVV8XCEState5State.name: onUpdate(_:)
Structs/State.html#/s:FVV8XCEState5State.abstract: Allows to finalize state declaration by adding given onUpdate closure to the already captured info.

Structs/State.html#/s:ZFV8XCEState5State.abstract: Two instances of State considered to be equal if their identifier properties are equal, regardless of the content of onSet and onUpdate closures.

Structs/State.html.name: State
Structs/State.html.abstract: Represents a distinct state that can be applied to any object of Target type.

Protocols/Stateful.html#/s:ZvP8XCEState8.name: defaultTransition
Protocols/Stateful.html#/s:ZvP8XCEState8.abstract: Transition that will be used by default, if it will be requested to apply new state via transition, but NO exact transition will be specified. This value will be used for initializing associated Dispatcher object.

Protocols/Stateful.html#/s:vE8XCEStatePS.name: state
Protocols/Stateful.html#/s:vE8XCEStatePS.abstract: Exclusive way to accessing state dispatcher of self. Lazy-initializable, weakly binded with self, deallocates automatically when self is deallocated.

Protocols/Stateful.html#/s:ZFE8XCEStateP.name: state(name:onSet:)
Protocols/Stateful.html#/s:ZFE8XCEStateP.abstract: Designeted metod for declaring state with onSet mutation closure only (without onUpdate).

Protocols/Stateful.html#/s:ZFE8XCEStateP.name: onSet(name:_:)
Protocols/Stateful.html#/s:ZFE8XCEStateP.abstract: Designeted metod for declaring state with both onSet and onUpdate mutation closures.

Enums/Transition/Pending.html.name: Pending
Enums/Transition/Pending.html.abstract: Intermediate data structure that temporary hodls data that is necessary to apply a new state via transition or instantly.

Enums/Transition.html#/s:FVO8XCEState10T.name: instantly()
Enums/Transition.html#/s:FVO8XCEState10T.abstract: Schedules intant transition into the new state.

Enums/Transition.html#/s:FVO8XCEState10T.name: viaTransition(_:)
Enums/Transition.html#/s:FVO8XCEState10T.abstract: Schedules transition into the new state using defaultTransition.

Enums/Transition.html#/s:FVO8XCEState10T.name: via(_:_:)
Enums/Transition.html#/s:FVO8XCEState10T.abstract: Schedules transition into the new state using explicitly specified transition.

Enums/Transition.html.name: Transition
Enums/Transition.html.abstract: A scope type that holds together types related to transition between states.

Classes/Dispatcher.html#/s:vC8XCEState10.name: target
Classes/Dispatcher.html#/s:vC8XCEState10.abstract: The object for which this dispatcher is managing state.

Classes/Dispatcher.html#/s:vC8XCEState10.name: defaultTransition
Classes/Dispatcher.html#/s:vC8XCEState10.abstract: Transition that will be used by default, if it will be requested to apply new state via transition, but NO exact transition will be specified.

Classes/Dispatcher.html.name: Dispatcher
Classes/Dispatcher.html.abstract: Keeps track of current object state and manages transitions into new states.
